label: VVPAT Deployment
definition: Use of voter-verified paper audit trails in electronic voting systems to enable independent audits.
inclusion_criteria: Studies evaluating VVPAT effects on auditability, error detection, or public trust.
exclusion_criteria: Purely technical printer reliability without audit implications.
examples: Post-election audits using VVPAT in state-level elections
notes: Map to audit mechanisms during extraction.

label: Risk-Limiting Audit
definition: A post-election audit that provides a pre-specified minimum chance of correcting a wrong electoral outcome.
inclusion_criteria: Studies implementing RLA pilots or evaluating statistical properties or outcomes.
exclusion_criteria: Audits that do not quantify risk or do not allow outcome correction.

label: Biometric Voter Registration
definition: Use of biometric identifiers to register or authenticate voters.
inclusion_criteria: Studies assessing accuracy, inclusion effects, or integrity outcomes of biometric systems.
examples: Fingerprint-based registration impact on duplicate entries
